name: You Seem to have Run into a Snag
name_original: You Seem to have Run into a Snag
description:
You are a fancy Snail with a very fancy shell, caught in a Snainstorm.

Hope you don't run into any other obstacles...

My entry into the Snails (Bitsy Jam).

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Use your arrow keys to or WASD to navigate your surroundings and to interact with objects.

CREDITS:

Made in Adam Le Doux's Bitsy, using  Andrew Yolland's Borksy for the plentiful hacks in the game. Music added using Add Music by Candle.

Music created using BeepBox.
